entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 17 with temperature falling to 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 17 with temperature falling to 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
